title: Red Days and Grey Nights
description: Ten years after being a sex slave, Pepper Phillips now has the means and opportunity to punish those responsible and to find her daughter. Pepper was a young woman abducted during a vacation and for years she was controlled by Don Bolivar, who took away her child for future use in his human trafficking business. Pepper managed to escape his control with the help of a wealthy businessman. As she prepares to seek vengeance, she realizes the local authorities are unwilling to help. That is when Pepper decides to seek justice in her own way.
author: Brandon Collier
